Get Started with
These Simple Steps:

1. Create your first order
2. Draw your driver’s route
3. Set up your driver’s account
4. Assign route to your driver
5. Equip your driver with our app
6. Complete your first delivery
With all the preparations complete, your driver is ready to proceed with their first delivery. Monitor their progress through a web dashboard in real time and celebrate the first of many successful deliveries as your business moves forward!
